92.eng-name: Afflictions and the End of the World

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Umar:I heard Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) while he was facing the East, saying, "Verily! Afflictions are there, from where the side of the head of Satan comes out

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم " الْفِتْنَةُ مِنْ قِبَلِ الْمَشْرِقِ "
